alert.note: Alert for Crowley County Including Ordway; Kiowa County Including Eads; Prowers County Including Lamar (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 11 at 2:57PM MDT until October 11 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 231, 234, AND 236... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM MDT THURSDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 231, 234, AND 236... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 11 AM to 7 PM MDT Thursday. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 231, 234 and 236. * Winds...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10-15 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County Including Ordway; Kiowa County Including Eads; Prowers County Including Lamar
